title: 3 and Out - Bills HC Sean McDermott Talks Allen, Building on Success; Bears HC Matt Nagy On Trubisky Questions, Draft
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Bills HC Sean McDermott Talks Allen, Building on Success; Bears HC Matt Nagy On Trubisky Questions, Draft
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff is on the ground with the latest buzz from Indy, heading into the weekend workouts. He also sits down with Bills Head Coach Sean McDermott to discuss how he plans to build on his team's success, and the growth of Josh Allen.

Bears Head Coach Matt Nagy also joins the pod to look back at 2019 disappointments, what he expects from Mitchell Trubisky going forward, draft needs, his philosophy and how he plans to bounce back in 2020. He also answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
